name: Zombie Click
description:
Howdy there! I've been getting to grips with Godot for a while, using this game as a sort of practice. 

The goal is simple: survive against waves of progressively-harder zombies, clicking on them to hurt and kill them, and upgrade yourself in the process. 

Press "P" to pause the game. All other controls will be stated in the game(spoiler: there aren't that many)

I probably won't add any updates, but any feedback would be taken into account for my future games. 

Credits:

1. Zombie sounds by "The Dictator"

2. Other sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

3. Fonts from "1001fonts.com"

Consider supporting me on Patreon:
